dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools
dependencies.name: autoconf

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools
dependencies.name: automake

dependencies.description: Programmable completion functions for bash.
dependencies.name: bash-completion

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description:
Doxygen is the de facto standard tool for generating documentation from
annotated C++ sources, but it also supports other popular programming
languages such as C, Objective-C, C#, PHP, Java, Python, IDL (Corba,
Microsoft, and UNO/OpenOffice flavors), Fortran, VHDL, Tcl, and to some
extent D..
dependencies.name: doxygen

dependencies.description:
The file command is "a file type guesser", that is, a command-line tool
that tells you in words what kind of data a file contains
dependencies.name: file

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: fortran

dependencies.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely. Note:
GEOPM interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs).
For proper usage make sure MSRs are made available via the msr or msr-
safe kernel modules by your administrator.
dependencies.name: geopm-service

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Intel oneAPI Math Kernel Library (Intel oneMKL; formerly Intel Math
Kernel Library or Intel MKL), is a library of optimized math routines
for science, engineering, and financial applications. Core math
functions include BLAS, LAPACK, ScaLAPACK, sparse solvers, fast Fourier
transforms, and vector math. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and
using this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the
software license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.
dependencies.name: intel-oneapi-mkl

dependencies.description:
libelf lets you read, modify or create ELF object files in an
architecture-independent way. The library takes care of size and endian
issues, e.g. you can process a file for SPARC processors on an Intel-
based system. Note: libelf is no longer maintained and packages that
depend on libelf should migrate to elfutils.
dependencies.name: libelf

dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
dependencies.name: libtool

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description: NUMA support for Linux
dependencies.name: numactl

dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code
dependencies.name: py-cffi

dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.
dependencies.name: py-docutils

dependencies.description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.
dependencies.name: py-geopmdpy

The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Service provides a user
interface for accessing hardware telemetry and settings securely.

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.
dependencies.name: py-psutil

dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.
dependencies.name: py-pygments

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,

dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
PyTables is a package for managing hierarchical datasets and designed to
efficiently and easily cope with extremely large amounts of data.
dependencies.name: py-tables

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.description:
stress-ng will stress test a computer system in various selectable ways.
It was designed to exercise various physical subsystems of a computer as
well as the various operating system kernel interfaces.
dependencies.name: stress-ng

dependencies.description: Unzip is a compression and file packaging/archive utility.

description:
The Global Extensible Open Power Manager (GEOPM) Runtime is designed to
enhance energy efficiency of applications through active hardware
configuration.
name: geopm-runtime
